description: An internet-famous milk tea shop known for its 4 flavors gelato offerings. The original store was established in L.A., and this is the inaugural branch in Taiwan.
address: No. 48, Lane 187, Section 1, Dunhua S Rd, Da'an District, Taipei City, Taiwan 106

product1.description:
Earl gray lemongrass and red oolong.
NT$120(Single) / NT$180(Double)
product1.name: Botanical Gelato

product2.description:
(M) Red oolong milk tea + cream foam
NT$100(12oz) / NT$120(16oz)
product2.name: Champion Milk Tea
